channel.title: Research Methods course website
channel.description: Website for Spring 2026 course Research Methods

item.title: meeting dates
item.description:
Meeting Dates for the semester
We meet on alternate mondays 3pm - 4:30pm on the following dates. At the February 9th meeting we decided that most meetings will take place in person. When meeting in person, we meet in the library DMZ area in the back right classroom.
February 9
February 23

item.title: biweekly assignments
item.description:
Assignments are due every two weeks
Weeks 1-2: Foundations through Digital Worlds
Overview
Begin by mapping your current interests and questions. What draws you to media, arts, or society? Keep a research journal to track emerging curiosities.
